thread.section_title: Blueinsurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blueinsurance | blueinsurance.ie
thread.title: DAVE (LOUTH)

author: DAVE (LOUTH)
title: DAVE (LOUTH)
text:
OK...Honest opinion.
I have been insuring both my car and my commercial vehicles for many years with the same companies and I have to say I have had problems, from policies being sent to the wrong Town to payments being lodged via the bank and yet are missing on the system. I stayed with one company for 15 years or so and could have 3 vehicles insured at any given time. They didn't care ....it was in my opinion always a task to get things done...
BLUE INSURANCE website is among the best (probably the best) that I have used...it was easy to navigate, easy to follow and input data and then after you get your Quote: and sign up you get your welcome pack via e-mail (check your e-mail as I didn't)....everything you need at the touch of a button
You know the thing about common sense?
Well they say it is not so common....BLUE INSURANCE's site is so well presented you don't even need common sense to negotiate it....what you waiting for? an invitation....
LOG ONTO BLUE!
YOU KNOW IT MAKES SENSE...
